# Dialectical Autocoder Command

Orchestrate adversarial player-coach loop for high-quality code synthesis. Based on dialectical autocoding methodology..

## Usage

```

```

This command invokes the `dialectical-autocoder` skill. See the skill documentation for detailed process steps.
